Christmas gift for a great grand daughter.
Just what I ordered. Part of my Christmas gift for my 2 1/2 year old great, great grand niece.

This little skirt set is so adorably cute.  Love the ruffles in the blouse and the little beret hat is amazing touch.  The material is soft and in good condition.  Does not look cheap at all.  Looking forward to my little one wearing it this fall.
This is nice and pretty okay quality. The skirt is thicker and the shirt is on the thinner side. It makes for a cute little outfit.

This is one of the most adorable outfits I've ever seen. I got it for my niece and she looks like an angel. The top is nice but also a little on the thin side. The skirt and hat are of great quality and very soft. This is a must for the fall season. It fits her perfectly and she is almost 18 months old. Overall, I would definitely recommend this outfit.

It is such a cute little set for little girls. I love the beret and the checkered style of this skirt. It will be perfect in winters with some pretty boots. I am not so kicked about the quality of the fabric though. It's soft but I feel it could be slightly better in terms of thickness. It will be useful for this season but not sure how it will be next year.

This is the absolute cutest outfit! You get the beret, a long sleeve shirt and a skirt. The shirt is a plain cream color, the beret matches the skirt and the skirt is a dark brown and light brown plaid. The shirt is very thin so not sure about wearing in the cold winter months but will be perfect for early spring and fall months.  It looks so cute on and is good quality.  Very pleased with this  purchase.

评论概述: Adorable Outfit with Room for Quality Improvement
评论详情: This baby girl outfit is undeniably cute and perfect for the fall season. The ruffle top, paired with the plaid skirt and matching hat, creates an adorable ensemble that fits well with the autumn aesthetic. The color combination, particularly the khaki top with the brown plaid skirt, is both stylish and seasonally appropriate.  The material of the clothing feels comfortable and soft against the skin, making it suitable for toddlers. However, the quality of the stitching leaves something to be desired. While the fabric itself is decent, the stitching isn't as durable or well-finished as I would expect. This might be a concern for parents looking for clothing that can withstand frequent washing and wearing.  The skirt is slightly longer, reaching below the knee, which is a nice touch for added warmth during cooler weather. It fits true to size, which is always a plus when shopping for kids' clothing online.  Given the price point, this outfit is reasonably priced for what you get. It's an affordable option for those looking for a cute seasonal outfit, though the quality might not make it the most long-lasting piece in your child’s wardrobe.
Great fit and cute outfit. Someone said my baby look like she just came back from the Olympics.

I’m happy to have got this for my almost 2 year old baby girl! It’s very cute and the little hat is just adorable! I wasn’t worried about it having fibers or anything bc imma wash it anyway. Love this with cream color stockings for my baby!!!

Very cute fall outfit for toddler and little girls. Fits true to size maybe, a bit on the bigger side. The skirt is longer, below the knee. Quality matches price point. The hat has a nice stretch, to where it actually will fit and stay on. Comfortable.

This was covered in weird loose threads and missed seams, and the fabric quality feels and looks very cheap (like Temu quality clothing). It's fine for just 1 or 2 wears, but don't expect it to last you much longer than that. Not really worth it unless you just want it for an event or a few pictures.
